title: Axe of Regrowth
summaries: The Axe of Regrowth is a multi-purpose tool. It functions identically to the Staff of Regrowth, increasing herb and herb seed collection by the same amount, and can be used to create grass on dirt. It can be used as an axe, with the unique aspect that it instantly places down an Acorn on the grass block directly underneath the tree after it is chopped.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

statistics.Tooltip:
Creates grass on dirt
Increases alchemy plant collection when used to gather
Plants acorns when cutting down trees
statistics.Sell: 150
